alert.note: Alert for Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 31 at 3:34AM MST until December 31 at 8:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than 0.25 miles in dense fog. * WHERE...Southwest Desert/Lower Gila River Valley County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Webcams and weather stations along Interstate 10 west of Lordsburg indicate very low visibility in the area.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley
